x: how could we advertise our celebrations to mark the centenary of the founding of the university?

x: that’s a good idea. we could put up some posters in and around the campus with a list of events. it would be quite cheap to do on the campus.

y: good thinking! we should also print some leaflets for students to distribute.

x: we should put some information about it on the home page of our university website. when people visit the website, they’ll see the information.
y: we could take out some advertisements to local newspapers. i checked the prices and they are reasonable.
